ygData.subject: The Worlds Gift.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Grounded awoke again not sure where he was. His optic sensors still not recieving anything.  Then all of a sudden his whole body shook, or so it seemed.

Subject: The Worlds Gift.

From: Jordan Guthrie <gunthers8@...>

::Grounded::
Grounded awoke again not sure where he was. His optic sensors still not 
recieving anything.  Then all of a sudden his whole body shook, or so it 
seemed.  All of a sudden he knew where everything was all around him, 
the bot carrying him, Trinity walking beside him, the walls.  Even 
though he could not see any of it.  It was there.  Then it dawned on 
him, he had inherited one of the many skills of a mole.  To feel 
vibrations like no other can.  With his sight now gone this was 
hightend.  And it felt great.  He was still to weak to do anything other 
than sit and think.  This awoke a memory from thousands of century's 
ago. Of a bot made to destroy organic life, and a bot to protect it. 
And the wars between them. The there was nothing.  Once again he entered 
stasis lock.
